name: Idle Gem Quest
description:
Idle Gem Quest: is a clicker game set in a fantasy world. Slay monsters, unlock new classes, upgrade heroes, and travel to new lands. Buy upgrades and unlock achievements to develop your team of Idle heroes.

What will you discover on your journey?




FEATURES
- Scratch the itch for your next clicker game
- Active play increases rewards
- Upgrade and maximize income while idle
- 5 classes to manage with varied input
- 70+ plus characters
- Achievements!
